((This number 2 if one doesn't arrive I'll resend.))

::?1-?6 Minus ?3 still repairing the ark::

::Lilly::
Lilly gets Inu transmission runs to the wall pushes it in to reveal a 
storage area looks at the black bag "Thats it." As she grabs the bag she 
puts all the datacubes and weapons in Koj's layer in it. She quickly goes to 
the Cryo Unit enters the code Koj gave her. As it compress and folds its 
self down she picks it and lastly grabs the scrolls of Legends sticking them 
in her hip compartment. "Now how do I get out of here?"

::Koj::
"Inu tell to use her Sonic Turbine also tell her it overheats so she is 
timed."

::Inu::
Sends the coded message.
